author: Vexed (Vexed#3211)
description: Check system metrics on the host device, such as CPU or  RAM usage
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! Most commands should work on all OSes but some might not. It should error gracefully. Info about available platforms is in the help menu.

This cog supports **both embeds and non-embeds**. Embeds are enabled by default, you can disable them with **`[p]system toggleembed`**. If embeds are set to be off with the core command `embedset`, that will override the setting for this cog.
This DOES NOT try to be similar to standard console commands.

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://s.vexcodes.com/c/system>
name: System
short: Check system metrics on the host device.
